tools.name: upload_file
tools.description: Uploads a new file.

tools.name: get_file_metadata
tools.description: Retrieves metadata for a file.

file_id.description: Unique identifier of the file or folder

tools.name: download_file
tools.description: Downloads the content of a file.

file_id.description: Unique identifier of the file or folder

format.description: Optional export format (e.g., pdf for docs)

tools.name: update_file_metadata
tools.description: Updates a file's name or description.

file_id.description: Unique identifier of the file or folder

tools.name: delete_file
tools.description: Moves a file to the trash.

file_id.description: Unique identifier of the file or folder

tools.name: copy_file
tools.description: Creates a copy of a file.

file_id.description: Unique identifier of the file or folder

tools.name: move_file
tools.description: Moves a file to a different folder.

file_id.description: Unique identifier of the file or folder

tools.name: list_files
tools.description: Lists files in a folder or matching a query.

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

tools.name: restore_file
tools.description: Restores a file from the trash.

file_id.description: Unique identifier of the file or folder

tools.name: empty_trash
tools.description: Permanently deletes all files in the trash.

tools.name: create_folder
tools.description: Creates a new folder.

tools.name: get_folder_metadata
tools.description: Retrieves metadata for a folder.

folder_id.description: Unique identifier of the file or folder

tools.name: list_folders
tools.description: Lists subfolders within a folder.

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

tools.name: move_folder
tools.description: Moves a folder to a different location.

folder_id.description: Unique identifier of the file or folder

tools.name: delete_folder
tools.description: Moves a folder to the trash.

folder_id.description: Unique identifier of the file or folder

tools.name: share_file
tools.description: Shares a file with a user or group.

file_id.description: Unique identifier of the file or folder

tools.name: unshare_file
tools.description: Removes a user's access to a file.

file_id.description: Unique identifier of the file or folder

tools.name: list_permissions
tools.description: Lists all permissions on a file.

file_id.description: Unique identifier of the file or folder

tools.name: update_permission
tools.description: Updates a user's role on a file.

file_id.description: Unique identifier of the file or folder

tools.name: create_shared_drive
tools.description: Creates a new shared drive (team drive).

tools.name: add_shared_drive_member
tools.description: Adds a member to a shared drive.

tools.name: list_shared_drives
tools.description: Lists shared drives the user has access to.

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

tools.name: get_share_link
tools.description: Generates a shareable link for a file.

file_id.description: Unique identifier of the file or folder

tools.name: create_comment
tools.description: Adds a comment to a file.

file_id.description: Unique identifier of the file or folder

anchor.description: JSON string specifying location in file

tools.name: list_comments
tools.description: Lists comments on a file.

file_id.description: Unique identifier of the file or folder

tools.name: resolve_comment
tools.description: Marks a comment as resolved.

file_id.description: Unique identifier of the file or folder

tools.name: list_revisions
tools.description: Lists version history of a file.

file_id.description: Unique identifier of the file or folder

tools.name: get_revision
tools.description: Retrieves metadata for a specific revision.

file_id.description: Unique identifier of the file or folder

tools.name: update_revision
tools.description: Updates revision properties (e.g., keep forever).

file_id.description: Unique identifier of the file or folder

tools.name: delete_revision
tools.description: Deletes a specific revision.

file_id.description: Unique identifier of the file or folder
